data.description: If you need a line of credit, you could consider using the equity you hold in your home as collateral.
data.name: Standard Living Equity Line of Credit - Investment

fees.name: Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $10 per cheque

fees.name: Title Registration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: amount charged by government

fees.name: Default Fee
fees.additionalInfo: will be charged monthly until no longer in default

fees.name: Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Consent to the registration of a Land Titles document over the security property to a third party

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: if Heritage is required to produce a security document to the State's Land Titles Authority or agency

fees.name: Title Search
fees.additionalInfo: The amount charged to Heritage per search per title.

fees.name: Title search - payable to Agent/Solicitor
fees.additionalInfo: The amount charged to Heritage by the Agent or Solicitor

fees.name: Agent's fees
fees.additionalInfo: Agent's fee payable to any agent used by Heritage or its solicitor to attend settlement or stamp, lodge or register a document on settlement of Loan.

fees.name: Bank cheques cost payable to any Bank issuing a bank cheque for settlement on settlement of Loan.
fees.additionalInfo: The amount charged by the bank to Heritage, its Agent or your Solicitor (currently estimated at approximately $12.00 per cheque)

fees.name: Further advance application fee
fees.additionalInfo: $7.50 per $1,000 applied for

fees.name: Special clearance fee
fees.additionalInfo: $15.00 (special clearance by mail) or $60.00 per hour plus cost, with a minimum of $30.00 (special clearance by hand delivery)

fees.name: Valuer's fee may become payable to Valuation Exchange Pty Ltd if Heritage obtains a valuation for a property subject to a Security in connection with a proposed transaction (such as an application for a further advance or an application to substitute securities).
fees.additionalInfo: The amount charged to Heritage

fees.name: Council mortgage notification fee
fees.additionalInfo: The amount charged by the local government

fees.name: Mortgage Dealing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Up to $47.55 per dealing

fees.name: Visa card replacement fee
fees.additionalInfo: $10.00 per card

fees.name: Emergency Visa card replacement fee
fees.additionalInfo: $25.00 (delivery within Australia) or $200.00 (delivery outside Australia)

fees.name: Government charges and duties may become payable to various Government and Statutory Institutions when receipts and withdrawals attract these charges and duties.

Second Mortgage Production Fee may become payable to the Bank or Financial Institution that holds the First Mortgage security if the Bank or Financial Institution that holds the First Mortgage over the security has to produce the Title Deed in order that Heritage's mortgage may be lodged for registration.
fees.additionalInfo: Amount charged by the First Mortgagee

fees.name: Overseas Currency Conversion Fee
fees.additionalValue: 3.0% of the Australian dollar amount of the transaction

fees.name: Manual Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $2.50 (transfer to Heritage account) or $4.00 (transfer to external payee)

fees.name: Cash Withdrawal Fee may become payable to Heritage if you withdraw more than $2,000 in cash from your Account (but only on the amount of the withdrawal exceeding $2,000).
Coin Deposit Fee may become payable to Heritage if a deposit of loose coins (unless they are correctly bagged and counted) is made to your Account.
Overseas Cheque Deposit Fee may become payable to Heritage whenever a cheque in foreign currency is deposited to your Account (note: we do not always accept these deposits).
Withdrawal (Visa) fee
fees.additionalInfo: $2.50(within Australia) or $5.00 (plus Overseas Currency Conversion Fee) (outside Australia)

fees.name: QBE - lenders mortgage insurance
fees.additionalInfo: amount charged to Heritage

eligibility.additionalValue: A citizen or permanent resident of Australia or New Zealand

features.additionalInfo: Access approved funds, via Heritage Online, Visa Debit or with a Chequebook
Make payments as frequently as you want within each month to pay the monthly amount due
Interest only terms up to 10 years
Interest calculated daily and charged monthly
